CatDescriptText: Delores Smith, housewife, 2008 Fifth Avenue, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 25, 1961, pg. 7 with question: "Do you think Negroes should hold high political offices, particularly those which have payrolls attached?" Answer reads: "Yes, I think they should, because it gives other Negroes a chance to advance... This is the only way we are going to get ahead."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Delores Smith wearing buttoned leather jacket and light colored earrings, standing in front of planter with flowers and tree, Downtown
